pageTitle: Finsbury Park bus station closure - Monday 22 November until Friday 10 December

title.title: Finsbury Park bus station closure - Monday 22 November until Friday 10 December

texts: From Monday 22 November, Finsbury Park bus station at Station Place will be closed for refurbishment works. The bus station will close at 07:00, reopening at 16:00 on Friday 10 December.
The following routes will be affected by the closure: 19, 106, 153, 236, and N19.
Routes 19, 106, 236, and N19 towards Finsbury Park will be diverted from St Thomas's Road via Seven Sisters Road and Isledon Road (passengers to alight at stop T).
Routes 19, 106, 236, and N19 from Finsbury Park will be diverted from the stand at Coleridge Road via Seven Sisters Road, Station Road and Blackstock Road.

The nearest bus stop for passengers is stop N in Blackstock Road.

Route 153 towards Finsbury Park will be diverted via Isledon Road to a temporary stop (passengers to alight at stop X).
Route 153 from Finsbury Park will be diverted from Isledon Road to its normal line of route.
The nearest bus stop for passengers is stop T on Isledon Road.
Details of diversions and stopping arrangements during this closure will be available at local bus stops, around the bus station and on Transport for London'sÂ website .
Bus station staff will also be available to advise passengers of where to catch their bus.
